live_updates: Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52871.summary: Some customers in the Northeast Crescent Heights area of Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52871.title: Aug 27 - Medicine Hat  (Northeast Crescent Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
